item.title: Active Directory with Samba 4 Domain Controller on Raspberry Pi
item.description: This is just a collection of tutorials for a home network experiment. The goal is to setup a small Active Directory domain to ease account management and local sharings. The Domain Controller will be based on Samba 4 running on a Raspberry Pi. I’ll have my other machines: several Windows, a few Debians, a Synology NAS, and potentially Mac OS X joining the domain.
